text: Ralph C. Johnson (December 17, 1953 - March 15, 2016) was an American politician and businessman. Born in New York City, New York, Johnson graduated from North Carolina Agricultural and Technical State University and was in the home improvement business in Greensboro, North Carolina. Johnson served as a Democratic member of the North Carolina House of Representatives from 2015 until his death in 2016.Greensboro New-Record,-Ralph Johnson He represented the 58th district. Johnson was African-American. Johnson died in a hospital in Greensboro, North Carolina after suffering a stroke.Guilford County state Rep.
